articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Lightning beat Canadiens to take control of Stanley Cup Final - Reuters
articles.description: The defending champion Tampa Bay Lightning beat the Montreal Canadiens 6-3 on Friday to take a commanding 3-0 series lead in the National Hockey League's best-of-seven Stanley Cup Final.
articles.content: July 2 (Reuters) - The defending champion Tampa Bay Lightning beat the Montreal Canadiens 6-3 on Friday to take a commanding 3-0 series lead in the National Hockey League's best-of-seven Stanley Cup … [+1661 chars]

articles.author: Julie Gordon
articles.title: Canadian retail sales slide in April, May as COVID-19 shutdown bites - Reuters
articles.description: Canadian retail sales plunged in April and May, as shops and other businesses were shuttered amid a third wave of COVID-19 infections, Statistics Canada data showed on Wednesday.
articles.content: A shopper walks from a Forever 21 fashion retail store in downtown Toronto, Ontario, Canada September 30, 2019. REUTERS/Chris HelgrenOTTAWA, June 23 (Reuters) - Canadian retail sales plunged in April… [+1614 chars]

articles.title: CANADA STOCKS-TSX opens lower ahead of BoC rate decision; Dollarama slides - Reuters
articles.description: Canada's main stock index opened lower on Wednesday as financial stocks declined ahead of the central bank's interest rate decision, while Dollarama Inc fell due to a downbeat forecast.

articles.description: Canada's main stock index fell on Friday, with BlackBerry Ltd leading declines following quarterly results, but the index was set for weekly gains.

articles.title: CANADA STOCKS-Energy stocks lift TSX as oil prices rise - Reuters
